description.narrative:
This investment hosts a number of activities of Australia's support to Mekong governments on water resources management. It includes our contribution to the Mekong River Commission, World Bank, ACIAR, M&#38;#38;E and Activity for Water Lead Specialist.
1). Australia provides A$6.5 million to baseket fund of Mekong River Commission to support the implementation of MRC's Strategic Plan 2016-2020. This is the main activity under this investment. Grant agreement with MRC commenced in 2014 and scheduled to end in June 2019.
2). Australia provides A$1,305,000 to World Bank's Mekong Integrated Water Resources Management Program as complementary support to MRC's component on transboundary and national programs in Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam and Thailand. Our Agreement with WB is scheduled to end in December 2019.
3). From July 2017, Australia provides $A1 million to co-finance with the Australian Centre for International Agricultural Research to assess fish passage facilities at Xayaburi dam in Laos.
